title: Bare Land for Sale in Nawala
details:
This is a 34P property which has 3 blocks attached together with easy access from the location to Nugegoda,Nawala and Colombo 5.

Ideal to build a luxury house with pool or to buy as in Investment for the future to be sold as 3 blocks.

Price Per Perch : LKR 3 million

NO BROKERS/AGENTS WILL BE ENTERTAINED
